title: Total no. of Grand Bargain signatories
tooltip: Total no. of Grand Bargain signatories

title: Organisations* publishing to IATI
tooltip: How many signatories are publishing via the IATI Standard?

title: Publishing hum. activity data
tooltip: How many signatories are using the features in IATI to make their specific humanitarian activities identifiable

title: Provides granular v2.02 data
tooltip: How many Signatories are using any of the specific humanitarian fields that were added into the IATI Standard at v2.02

title: Publishing IATI tracability info
tooltip: How many Signatories are using the mechanisms within IATI to enable data users to potentially ‘follow the money’ through the funding and delivery chain

title: Providing granular v2.03 data
tooltip: How many Signatories are using any of the specific humanitarian fields that were added into the IATI Standard at v2.03

title: Latest version of the IATI standard used
tooltip: What is the latest version of the IATI Standard that this publisher is using

title: Latest update
tooltip: The actual date when the publisher’s data was last updated (related to timeliness)

title: Data errors
tooltip: Indicates if they publisher has errors in their data in that the published information is not compliant with the IATI Standard and any associated rulesets. Not all publishers consistently validate or check the data they publish so errors do occur quite frequently

title: Data first published
tooltip: Data first published

title: All activities
tooltip: The total number of IATI activities published

title: Humanitarian OECD DAC sector code 700 or 70000 range
tooltip: The no. of hum activities where one or more OECD DAC codes has been specified. OECD DAC codes provide a list of sector that an activity might relate to eg Primary Education, STD control including HIV etc.

title: Humanitarian indicator
tooltip: Activities that the publisher has positively identified as ‘humanitarian’ by marking with the humanitarian indicator

title: UN humanitarian response plan(s)
tooltip: Activities that the publisher has identified as contributing to meeting the requirements of one or more UN hum. response plan.

title: GLIDE code(s)
tooltip: Activities that the publisher has identified as relating to a specific crisis. Can be provided in addition to UN HRP plan codes. NB Glide codes are managed by the Asian Reduction Disaster centre and a Glide code is allocated for most natural disasters or other incidents requiring hum. assistance

title: Organisation's own internal crisis codes(ie using vocab '99')
tooltip: Historically many organisation have used their own internal bespoke codes for each individual crisis (rather than using the external & generic UN HRP or GLIDE codes). These internal codes can also be included in the IATI data that is published

title: Clusters
tooltip: Activities that the publisher has specifically identified as being relevant for one or more UN crisis cluster(s) (aka sectors) eg Education, Logistics, Nutrition etc

title: Earmarked for Grand Bargain (categories)
tooltip: No of activities which have a Grand Bargain earmarking category applied to indicate the earmarking of both/either the received and disbursed funding eg Unearmarked, Softly earmarked etc. NB there are two levels of earmarking and this count is for  category

title: Earmarked for Grand Bargain (modalities)
tooltip: No of activities which have a Grand Bargain earmarking category applied to indicate the earmarking of both/either the received and disbursed funding eg Unearmarked, Softly earmarked etc. NB there are two levels of earmarking and this count is for  modality

title: Partner country based (I)NGO organisation type used
tooltip: No of hum activities where a partner country NGO has been referenced as either an implementing partner and/or is receiving funds

title: Cash transfer (not yet available in IATI standard)
tooltip: No of hum activities which have been specifically flagged to indicate that the activity and/or funding is related to a cash transfer programme. NB the cash codes have not yet been agreed and have therefore not as yet been added to IATI Standard v2.03

title: OECD DAC sector codes
tooltip: The no. of hum activities where one or more OECD DAC codes has been specified. OECD DAC codes provide a list of sector that an activity might relate to eg Primary Education, STD control including HIV etc.

title: OECD DAC aid types
tooltip: The no. of hum activities where one or more OECD DAC aid type(s) has been specified. OECD aid type codes provide an indication of what type of aid or aid financing is being provided eg Core contributions, project type interventions

title: Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
tooltip: The no. of hum activities which have been assessed as relating to 1 or more of the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)

title: OECD DAC gender marker
tooltip: The no. of hum activities which have been flagged as having a gender component to it. NB more work needs to be done within the GB to potentially align the DAC and the Grand Bargain gender markers?

title: Results
tooltip: No of hum. activities which have some type of results information specified.

title: Results documents links
tooltip: Publishers can provide URL links to documents or web sites where their results information are held. NB Publishers are encouraged to provide results information in a structured format ie with baselines and targets so that data across publishers can be aggregated etc. rather than using this approach

title: Result indicators with baseline and target values
tooltip: No of hum activities that have structured result information provided and which have specific baseline and targets set.

title: Result indicator documents links
tooltip: Similarly to result document links above. Publishers can provide URL links to documents or web sites where their specific results indicator information are held.

title: Recipient countries
tooltip: The no. of hum activities where the intended beneficial recipient country(s) has been specified

title: Recipient regions
tooltip: The no. of hum activities where the intended beneficial recipient region(s) has been specified

title: Latitude / longitude coordinates
tooltip: The no of hum activities where information specifying the actual location for an activity is taking place via latitude and longitude coordinates

title: Describing location according to a recognised geo-location gazetteer
tooltip: The no of hum activities where information specifying the actual location for an activity is taking place via a value from a recognised geo-location gazetteer

title: Using any other type of sub-national location data
tooltip: The no of hum activities where information specifying the actual location or area within a country where the activity or intervention is taking place. Sub-national data may be provided as lat/long coordinates, the name of a village or town or other place, an administrative area etc

title: Duration > 24 months
tooltip: No of humanitarian activities that relate to interventions that are currently ‘in progress’ and which have been planned / programmed to last more than 24 months. NB the 24 months threshold will need to be replaced by whatever duration of interest is ultimately identified by the Multi Year funding workstream

title: Current hum. activities > 24 months budget exempt
tooltip: As above but where the activity has been specifically marked to indicate that a forward looking budget cannot be provided

title: Current hum. activities > 24 months & budgets for > 'next' 12 months
tooltip: As above but only those activities that have also had actual funding allocated beyond the normal 12 month planning cycle are counted

title: Default currency
tooltip: What currency is the publisher providing its financial information in?

title: Reports to UN OCHA Financial Tracking Service (FTS)
tooltip: Does this organisation currently report to UN OCHA’s Financial Tracking Service

title: Reports to UN OCHA for FTS via IATI
tooltip: Does this organisation report to the UN OCHA’s Financial Tracking Service by having its published IATI data automatically imported

title: Reports to European Union (EDRIS)
tooltip: Reports to European Union (EDRIS)

title: Operational funds available
tooltip: Operational funds available

title: Disbursements & expenditure
tooltip: Disbursements & expenditure

tooltip: Rating
